django.contrib.admindocs.middleware
===================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.admindocs.middleware


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.admindocs.middleware.XViewMiddleware


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: XViewMiddleware(get_response)

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.utils.deprecation.MiddlewareMixin`


   Add an X-View header to internal HEAD requests.


   .. py:method:: process_view(request, view_func, view_args, view_kwargs)

      If the request method is HEAD and either the IP is internal or the
      user is a logged-in staff member, return a response with an x-view
      header indicating the view function. This is used to lookup the view
      function for an arbitrary page.
